      summary: 'Why more autonomous AI requires more human judgment, not less.',

        <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #FEF3C7, #FDE68A); padding: 20px; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 20px; border-left: 4px solid #F59E0B;">
          <p style="font-size: 17px; font-style: italic; margin: 0; color: #78350F; line-height: 1.6;">"The irony of agentic AI is that the more autonomous these systems become, the more critical human judgment gets ‚Äî not less."</p>
        </div>

        <p><strong>What is Agentic AI?</strong></p>
        <p>AI systems that can take autonomous actions ‚Äî browsing the web, writing and running code, managing workflows, making decisions in sequence. They don't just respond to prompts; they pursue goals.</p>

        <p><strong>The Paradox:</strong></p>
        <p>As AI becomes more capable of autonomous action, human roles don't disappear ‚Äî they shift:</p>

        <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px; margin: 16px 0;">
          <div style="background: #F1F5F9; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="font-size: 24px;">üéØ</span>
            <div>
              <strong>Defining what "good" looks like</strong><br>
              <span style="color: #64748B;">AI can optimise, but humans must define the goal worth optimising for</span>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="background: #F1F5F9; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="font-size: 24px;">üöß</span>
            <div>
              <strong>Setting constraints</strong><br>
              <span style="color: #64748B;">What should AI never do? What boundaries matter?</span>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="background: #F1F5F9; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="font-size: 24px;">üõë</span>
            <div>
              <strong>Knowing when to override</strong><br>
              <span style="color: #64748B;">Recognising when AI confidence exceeds AI competence</span>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <p><strong>Two Approaches to Agentic AI:</strong></p>
        <table style="width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 16px 0;">
          <tr style="background: #FEE2E2;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; font-weight: bold;">Delegation Approach</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">Let AI run autonomously, check outputs occasionally</td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="background: #FEE2E2;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; font-weight: bold;">Result</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; color: #991B1B;">Confident, unsupervised mediocrity at scale</td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="background: #DCFCE7;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; font-weight: bold;">Amplification Approach</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">Strong human-in-the-loop governance, clear constraints</td>
          </tr>
          <tr style="background: #DCFCE7;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; font-weight: bold;">Result</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; color: #166534;">Dramatic outperformance</td>
          </tr>
        </table>

        <p><strong>What This Means for You:</strong></p>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Teaching:</strong> Prepare students to supervise AI, not just use it</li>
          <li><strong>Research:</strong> Human judgment on methodology remains essential</li>
          <li><strong>Admin:</strong> Define clear approval workflows for AI-assisted decisions</li>
        </ul>

        <div style="background: #E0E7FF; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px;">
          <strong>The Bottom Line:</strong><br>
          The question isn't "will AI replace human judgment?" It's "how do we ensure human judgment scales alongside AI capability?"
        </div>
      `

      summary: 'Addressing resistance and stigma around using AI tools.',
      content: `
        <p><strong>Understanding AI Shame</strong></p>
        <p>AI shaming is the stigma directed at academics who use AI tools, seen as undermining the ideal that scholarship should be entirely "human intellect-driven."</p>

        <div style="background: #FEE2E2; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin: 16px 0;">
          <strong>Types of AI Resistance:</strong><br>
          - <strong>Traditionalists:</strong> Value established methods, resist change<br>
          - <strong>Technophobes:</strong> Fear technology and AI generally<br>
          - <strong>Elitists:</strong> See AI as threat to status or expertise<br>
          - <strong>Misunderstanders:</strong> Don't grasp AI capabilities, default to sci-fi fears
        </div>

        <p><strong>Reframing Our Relationship with AI</strong></p>
        <table style="width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 16px 0;">
          <tr style="background: #FEE2E2;">
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;"><strong>Old View</strong></td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;"><strong>New View</strong></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">"Real scholarship is purely human"</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; background: #DCFCE7;">"Scholarship is human intellect directing appropriate tools"</td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">"Using AI is cheating"</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; background: #DCFCE7;">"Using AI without disclosure or understanding is problematic"</td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">"AI will replace academics"</td>
            <td style="padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; background: #DCFCE7;">"AI augments capabilities for those who master it"</td>
          </tr>
        </table>

        <p><strong>Moving Forward:</strong></p>
        <ul>
          <li>Experiment with one small task</li>
          <li>Document and share your process</li>
          <li>Practice transparent disclosure</li>
          <li>Shift from "human vs. machine" to "human + machine"</li>
        </ul>
      `

  function renderResources() {
    const container = document.getElementById('resources-container');
    const query = searchQuery.toLowerCase();

    const filtered = resources.filter(r => {
      const matchesCategory = currentCategory === 'all' || r.category === currentCategory;
      const matchesRole = currentRole === 'all' || r.roles.includes(currentRole);
      const matchesSearch = query === '' ||
        r.title.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
        r.summary.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||
        r.content.toLowerCase().includes(query);

      return matchesCategory && matchesRole && matchesSearch;
    });

    document.getElementById('results-count').textContent = `${filtered.length} resource${filtered.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} found`;

    if (filtered.length === 0) {
      container.innerHTML = `
        <div style="text-align: center; padding: 48px; color: #64748B;">
          <div style="font-size: 48px; margin-bottom: 16px;">üîç</div>
          <p>No resources match your filters. Try adjusting your search or filters.</p>
        </div>
      `;
      return;
    }

    container.innerHTML = filtered.map(r => `
      <div class="resource-card" data-id="${r.id}" style="background: white; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px; overflow: hidden;">
        <div class="resource-header" onclick="toggleResource('${r.id}')" style="padding: 20px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 16px;">
          <span style="font-size: 28px; flex-shrink: 0;">${r.emoji}</span>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 4px;">
              <span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A;">${r.title}</span>
              <span style="background: ${getCategoryColor(r.category)}; color: white; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 10px; font-size: 11px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; text-transform: uppercase;">${r.category}</span>
            </div>
            <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0; line-height: 1.5;">${r.summary}</p>
          </div>
          <span class="expand-icon" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.2s ease;">‚ñº</span>
        </div>
        <div class="resource-content" style="display: none; padding: 0 20px 20px 64px; border-top: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">
          <div style="padding-top: 16px; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; color: #334155;">
            ${r.content}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    `).join('');
  }

  function getCategoryColor(category) {
    const colors = {
      framework: '#4F46E5',
      technique: '#7C3AED',
      template: '#0EA5E9',
      guide: '#22C55E',
      reading: '#F59E0B'
    };
    return colors[category] || '#64748B';
  }

  window.toggleResource = function(id) {
    const card = document.querySelector(`.resource-card[data-id="${id}"]`);
    const content = card.querySelector('.resource-content');
    const icon = card.querySelector('.expand-icon');

    if (content.style.display === 'none') {
      content.style.display = 'block';
      icon.style.transform = 'rotate(180deg)';
    } else {
      content.style.display = 'none';
      icon.style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
    }
  };

  window.setCategory = function(category) {
    currentCategory = category;
    document.querySelectorAll('.category-btn').forEach(btn => {
      if (btn.dataset.category === category) {
        btn.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        btn.style.color = 'white';
      } else {
        btn.style.background = '#F1F5F9';
        btn.style.color = '#64748B';
      }
    });
    renderResources();
  };

  window.setRole = function(role) {
    currentRole = role;
    document.querySelectorAll('.role-btn').forEach(btn => {
      if (btn.dataset.role === role) {
        btn.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        btn.style.color = 'white';
      } else {
        btn.style.background = '#F1F5F9';
        btn.style.color = '#64748B';
      }
    });
    renderResources();
  };

  window.filterResources = function() {
    searchQuery = document.getElementById('search-input').value;
    renderResources();
  };

  // Initialize
  renderResources();
})();
</script>
